Welcome to QuantumAudio Module's documentation!
===============================================

This page contains the API reference of the quantumaudio module.

IMPORTANT: If you are looking for documentation on How to Use this package, there is a Jupyter Notebook Tutorial available `Here <https://github.com/iccmr-quantum/quantumaudio/blob/main/tutorial_quantum_audio_module.ipynb>`_.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   modules
